{"id":1261790861,"question_id":3427,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1716087673,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1261790861/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Special Array II","memory":"98.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean[] isArraySpecial(int[] nums, int[][] queries) {\n        int q = queries.length;\n        int n = nums.length;\n        \n        boolean[] res = new boolean[q];\n        int[] parity = new int[n];\n\n        for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {\n            parity[i] = parity[i - 1];\n            if ((nums[i - 1] % 2) != (nums[i] % 2)) {\n                parity[i]++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0;i<q;i++){\n            int st = queries[i][0];\n            int end = queries[i][1];\n            \n            int specialCount = parity[end] - (st > 0 ? parity[st] : 0);\n            boolean isSpecial = specialCount == (end - st);\n            res[i] = isSpecial;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"special-array-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
